Introduction
============
Plateau State Integration Revenue Administration system(PIRAS); It's purpose is to help plateau state administer, manage Tax Identification Numbers (TIN) as well as tax payment for companies and individuals

Purpose
-------
The Design Document provides a comprehensive architectural overview of the Integrated Revenue Administration System (IRAS). It presents some different
architectural views such as the Design View, Process view, and Functional
Requirement view to depict the system.
